data.title: Armadillo Merino®
data.meta_description: Kojak Beanie is a super soft merino beanie that covers your ears for warmth and comfort. Designed for use under a helmet at home in the outdoors or on the range.
data.text:
KOJAK Merino Wool Beanie

£27.50

Colour

Light Olive

Black

Hotshot Red

Dark Navy

Natural White

Coyote Brown

Product information

Soft and durable beanie hat with flattened seams for increased comfort. Long enough to cover your ears, and the perfect weight for use in almost any condition.

Armadillo Merino Kojak is easy care, machine washable and quick drying.

Features:

Beanie with flattened seams

Designed and comfortable under a helmet

Double-layered headband for added warmth

Covers the bottom of your ears to stop frost nip on the ear lodes

Technical Specifications

Fabric weight: 170g/m2 = 5.0oz/yd2

Fabric: 100% Merino Wool, Jersey Knit

Garment weight: 28g = 0.98oz

Micron: 18.5 Micron itch free merino

Stitching: Flatlock chaffing free stitching, with extra strong thread. Discrete logo placement.

Designed for: Under a helmet or stand-alone

Benefits: No melt or drip, no smell and super comfortable 365 days a year

Designed in the UK. Made in Lithuania

Style Number: 21301

Washing instructions

Machine wash at 40°C (warm), line dry or tumble dry low heat.

Shipping and returns

Same-day shipping. Order before 1500 UK time

Free shipping on all UK orders and International orders over £100

Hassle free returns
